resume.name: BEATRIZ ESTEVEZ

experience.role: Lead Student Researcher - Actuarial Science Department
experience.description: Developed a predictive model using R to analyze the impact of climate change on property insurance claim frequencies. Applied stochastic modeling techniques to forecast long-term loss reserves for regional carriers.

Conducted a statistical analysis of mortality trends in pension fund participants using SQL for data extraction and Python for data visualization. Evaluated the sensitivity of annuity pricing to shifting interest rate environments.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python
